    ItemBuilder.createBuff(int price, ItemBuilder.ItemSize size)
    Creates and returns a damage buff item of the desired price and size.
    static Item

    Creates and returns a healing item of the desired price and size.
    static Item
    ItemBuilder.createRevive(int price)
    Creates and returns a full revive item.
    static Item
    Generation.generateItem(int day, int diff, boolean enemyItem)
    Generates a random item from the current day, using ItemBuilder to create the items.
